result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. RANDY L ROBINSON

records.addlTxt: Letter to the defendant dated 10/03/2022 re: Court appoints Atty J. Steven Heil. Defendant is to pay $25.00 per month commencing 11/01/2022 for court appointed attorney fees.
Order on Petition for Appointment of an Attorney (Atty J. Steven Heil)

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant RANDY L ROBINSON in court.  Attorney Gerise Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Statement by defendant, was appointed counsel in one case, but not yet on this case. Court will set both cases (22CF75 & 22CM3) for Status Hearing on November 8, 2022 at 2:30 PM.
Status hearing scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status hearing on November 8, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report, qualifies for SPD, but no attorney appointed yet

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant RANDY L ROBINSON in court.  Attorney Gerise Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Statement by defendant - qualifies for PD representation and no one has been appointed as of yet. Court sets for Status of Counsel on September 12, 2022 at 10:30 AM
Second appearance scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Second appearance on September 12, 2022 at 10:30 am.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report - Defendant is eligible for SPD services. No attorney appointed yet.

Defendant called inquiring what his hearing is for tomorrow. He stated he did was not aware he needs to apply for this case with the Public Defender's office and was given the phone number to call to apply. He was made aware that he needs to appear for the hearing tomorrow at 10:00 a.m., if he does not have an attorney appointed by that time.
Second appearance on July 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:23 AM Defendant Randy L. Robinson in court.  Attorney Matthew McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls 2022CM3 & 2022CF75. Court questions defendant is he is getting an attorney. Statement by defendant. Court sets for Status of Counsel on July 12, 2022 at 10:00 AM.

Court adjourned at 10:26 AM
Second appearance scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report (Defendant is eligible for SPD, no attorney at this time.)

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Second appearance on May 31, 2022 at 11:30 am.

No Contact with the victim the victim's residence or property of ARF. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is not to discuss this case with the co-defendant. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
**PROCESSING COMPLETE**

No Contact with the victim the victim's residence or property of ARF. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is not to discuss this case with the co-defendant. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

9:53 AM Defendant RANDY L ROBINSON in court.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count and as repeater. Court instructs defendant of his/her right to an attorney.  Defendant states he applied for PD representation. DA makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of: No Contact with the victim the victim's residence or property of ARF. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is not to discuss this case with the co-defendant. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department. Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the time limits. Court will set for Status of Counsel on May 31, 2022 at 11:30 AM..

Court adjourned at 9:56 AM
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report - is eligible and no attorney appointed at this time.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 3, 2022 at 09:30 am.

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant RANDY L ROBINSON by video.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Court informs defendant his court date has been rescheduled to May 3, 2022 at 9:30 AM. It is a mandatory in person appearance. Def needs to appear or a warrant may be issued. Def stated he understood.

1:18 PM Defendant RANDY L ROBINSON not in court.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Court notes def was on zoom but he is not here now. Court orders a warrant - stayed until May 3rd at 9:30 AM. Def needs to appear on that date and time or before or the warrant will be issued.

Court adjourned at 1:18 PM.

Def called and requested that his court date this afternoon be adjourned due to being sick. Per the DA's Office, they wanted this case to track with the co-defendant's case. Def's phone number and address were verified. Def was given the zoom instructions.
**PROCESSING NEEDED**
